attributes.action: set an example to the Public Sector in general by immediately changing MPs Gold Plated Pensions to the Money Purchase variety which predominates in the Private Sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become accepted that the country cannot afford to continue paying Public Sector gold plated pensions. It will be difficult to persuade those in the Public Sector to give up easily their entitlement without some sort of gesture by politicians 'leading the way' by giving up theirs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
